title: Taping it down
body: Nicole and I spent Monday evening measuring the building and taping down where we wanted the walls to be built. Hilarity ensued! We used this handy little laser level to determine the slope of the auditorium floor. Nicole thinks it kind of looks like Darth Vader. I think she's right. Once the basic measurements were made, it was time to start putting down tape where we wanted the walls to be built. I'm widely regarded as the fastest taper in the West. West of the camera and East of that wall. Here's me pondering whether I should eat the jelly bean that I spotted in the corner. I'm also banging out the drum solo from the Beatle's "The End" with only one hand!
author: Dan

comments.author: Justin
comments.body: it looks like you have a strange looking beer gut in that last picture.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I'm just as God made me, sir.
